text: Damageplan was a heavy metal band from Dallas, Texas. They started playing in 2003 after Pantera's guitarist and drummer decided to start a new band. They only released one album, called New Found Power. On December 8, 2004, the guitarist Dimebag Darrell was shot and killed by an obsessed fan named Nathan Gale during a concert. After the incident, the band broke up. ==References== Category:2003 establishments in the United States Category:2004 disestablishments in the United States Category:2000s American music groups Category:American heavy metal bands Category:Musical groups established in 2003 Category:Musical groups disestablished in 2004 Category:Musical groups from Dallas
title: Damageplan
